You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(RMySQL)
library(tm)
library(SnowballC)
library(Matrix)
library(lda)
library(LDAvis)
library(servr)
library(fpc)
library(wordcloud)

subcases=NULL
mydb = dbConnect(MySQL(), user='root', password='', dbname='domainanalysis', host='localhost')
subcases<-dbGetQuery(mydb, "SELECT * FROM `assetpartconditiondistribution` where equipmentType='STEAM_TURBINE' LIMIT 2000")
stopwordsList<-dbGetQuery(mydb, "SELECT stopword FROM `stopwordss`")
domainWords<-dbGetQuery(mydb, "SELECT * FROM `domainwordss`")

# df=subset(subcases,subcases$Noun1_Count>median(subcases$Noun1_Count))

df=subcases
freqTable=sort(table(df$Noun1),decreasing = TRUE)


finalWordsForCloud=names(freqTable)
finalFreq=freqTable

#layout(matrix(c(1, 2), nrow=3), heights=c(1, 4))


#par(mfrow=c(2,1))

plot.new()

#text(x=1,y=1,"STEAM_TURBINE")
barplot(freqTable)




wordcloud(finalWordsForCloud, finalFreq,
            random.order = FALSE,
            colors=brewer.pal(8, "Dark2"),
            random.color=TRUE,
            max.words = 5000,
            rot.per=.25,
            scale=c(4,.5)
            
            )
  
par(mfrow=c(1,1))







```
